summary.span: 使 .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server 可以協助確保使用者具有足夠的安全性等級來存取資料來源。

span.span: Enables the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server to help make sure that a user has a security level sufficient to access a data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會優先於屬性。The property takes precedence over the property. 因此，如果您設定要`false`，您也必須設定到`false`以防止使用者進行連接，使用空白密碼。Therefore, if you set to `false`, you must also set to `false` to prevent a user from making a connection using a blank password. > [!NOTE] > 當使用 ADO.NET 程式碼存取安全性權限，正確的模式是限制最嚴格的情況下 （完全沒有權限） 開始，然後加入所需的程式碼必須執行特定工作的特定權限。When using code access security permissions for ADO.NET, the correct pattern is to start with the most restrictive case (no permissions at all) and then add the specific permissions that are needed for the particular task that the code needs to perform. 相反的模式，以所有權限開始，然後再拒絕特定權限，並不安全，因為有許多方法可表示相同的連接字串。The opposite pattern, starting with all permissions and then denying a specific permission, is not secure, because there are many ways of expressing the same connection string. 例如，如果您以所有權限開始，然後嘗試拒絕連接字串 "server=someserver" 的用法，您仍可使用 "server=someserver.mycompany.com" 字串。For example, if you start with all permissions and then attempt to deny the use of the connection string "server=someserver", the string "server=someserver.mycompany.com" would still be allowed. 只要以不授與任何權限開始，您就能減少權限集合具有漏洞的機會。By always starting by granting no permissions at all, you reduce the chances that there are holes in the permission set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要設定特定的權限物件所允許的連接字串中使用這個方法。Use this method to configure which connection strings are allowed by a particular permission object. 如果您想要只允許特定連接字串和其他內容，例如，使用下列程式碼片段：For example, use the following code fragment if you want to only allow a specific connection string and nothing else: `permission.Add("server=MyServer; database=MyDatabase; Integrated Security=true", "", KeyRestrictionBehavior.AllowOnly)` 下列範例會允許使用任何資料庫，但只能在伺服器上名為 MyServer，與任何使用者名稱和密碼組合不包含任何其他的連接字串關鍵字的連接字串：The following example allows connection strings that use any database, but only on the server named MyServer, with any user and password combination and containing no other connection string keywords: `permission.Add("server=MyServer;", "database=; user id=; password=;", KeyRestrictionBehavior.AllowOnly)` 下列範例會使用上述的相同案例，但可以在連接到設定為鏡像伺服器時使用的容錯移轉夥伴是用來：The following example uses the same scenario as above but allows for a failover partner that can be used when connecting to servers configured for mirroring: `permission.Add("server=MyServer;
